snippet: Books from university presses explore the historical depiction of slavery and African-Americans. This month Heritage Auctions is holding a sale of Elvis Presley artifacts in Memphis.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; several new books explore the historical depiction of slavery and African-Americans; Heritage Auctions plans a sale of Elvis Presley memorabilia in Memphis.
lead_paragraph: Books from university presses explore the historical depiction of slavery and African-Americans. This month Heritage Auctions is holding a sale of Elvis Presley artifacts in Memphis.

headline.seo: Elvis Presley Auction; Books on Depictions of Slaves
headline.main: Books Analyzing Images of Slaves in History
headline.print_headline: Books Analyzing Images of Slaves in History
